title: 2.30: European Universities Association
author: Higher Education Strategy Associates
content:encoded: Today's guest is Thomas Jorgensen, the Director for Policy Coordination and Foresight at the European University Association. He walk us through the way policy is made in Brussels and how European Commission has gradually acquired competencies in areas relevant to higher education.
